Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored a century in his first international match in nearly 3 years, setting up India's massive 101-run win over Afghanistan.
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma opted to rest for this inconsequential match.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed relief after achieving his 71st international hundred, marking a significant milestone in his career.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan's top order was blown away by Bhuvneshwar Kumar, who took 5/4 in his four overs.
